description: Dive into "Granada's Hidden Waterfall Wonders" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Granada's Hidden Waterfall Wonders

places.generalDescription: Plaza del Ángel serves as a convenient starting point for your adventure. You can easily reach it by walking or hopping on bus #8, which will take you to the Plaza del Ángel bus stop. From there, catch bus #0183 to Plaza Miraflores, and in about an hour, you'll be ready to embark on a scenic hike along the river. This picturesque trail features charming suspension bridges and leads you through stunning canyons of Monachil where several hidden waterfalls await discovery.

sources.snippet: Basically, you can either walk or take bus #8 to the Plaza del Ángel bus stop. From there, take bus #0183 to the Plaza Miraflores, and you should arrive in about an hour. From there, it is a pretty straightforward hike along the river, crossing suspension bridges, and you will find several waterfalls tucked away in the canyons of Monachil.
sources.shortName: Explore Granada: 8 Incredible Activities You’ll Love

places.name: Pl. del Ángel
